channel.title: Two Easy Questions For A Good Coder!
channel.description:
Hello I need some help froma good coder or just someone that knows. I was coding some things on my server such as saying "welcome to cold isle" and so on. When I went to go compile this appeared.
client.java:13780: not a statement of ^ Client.java:13780: ';' expected of ^
Does anyone know how I could get this off?

There is a difference ok back seat mod?

item.title: Two Easy Questions For A Good Coder!
item.dc:creator: @ricky_james ricky james
item.description:
@ricky_james wrote:

EATALOT2002:

[quote]To change name go to client and if you press ctrl and f and text box will gome in there type satans isle and go through changing the bits u want to into you’r server name then save and compile.

and thats what I said[br][size=1]Posted on: June 25, 2007, 01:03:02 PM[/size][hr]read previous posts before posting. -.-[/quote][quote=“sw0z0r, post:8, topic:116352”]WOW!
Thanks Alot Guys Ur All Alot of help!!
Now I can have some more fun coding :rolleyes:
thanks again[br][size=1]Posted on: June 25, 2007, 01:12:00 PM[/size][hr]Sorry for double-posting but does anyone know???[/quote]please dont double post you can get warned or even muted for this

Read full topic

item.title: Two Easy Questions For A Good Coder!
item.dc:creator: @i_am_an_elf i am an elf
item.description:
@i_am_an_elf wrote:

[quote=“zamorak07, post:5, topic:116352”]adding items to shops you need to find shops and then again make the shop you want or fidn the one you want to add the item to then add the item id and the amount you want it sold then save and compile and you’r done.

Hope i helped ;D[/quote]

that makes no sense mine is more help you didnt post were to look at all so what he could prolly go looking in liek objects or something…

Read full topic
item.source: Two Easy Questions For A Good Coder!

item.title: Two Easy Questions For A Good Coder!
item.dc:creator: @zamorak07 zamorak07
item.description:
@zamorak07 wrote:

To change name go to client and if you press ctrl and f and text box will gome in there type satans isle and go through changing the bits u want to into you’r server name then save and compile.

adding items to shops you need to find shops and then again make the shop you want or fidn the one you want to add the item to then add the item id and the amount you want it sold then save and compile and you’r done.

Hope i helped ;D

Read full topic
item.source: Two Easy Questions For A Good Coder!

item.title: Two Easy Questions For A Good Coder!
item.dc:creator: @i_am_an_elf i am an elf
item.description:
@i_am_an_elf wrote:

ok first off you gotta open up shop.cfg and there should be listed alot of shops, but im using this as help

shop = 1 Random_St00f 1 1 1931 5 1935 2 1735 2 1925 3 1923 2 1887 2 590 2

ok random st00f is the shops name and just type in the item id and how much you want of the item after the last 2

Read full topic

item.title: Two Easy Questions For A Good Coder!
item.dc:creator: @EATALOT2002 EATALOT2002
item.description:
@EATALOT2002 wrote:

First of all to change greeting. Open client.java find and replace all Satan’s Isle and change it to (yourservernamehere) save + compile.

The second problem I cannot be bothered to explain sorry

Hope I helped.

Read full topic
